full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 58 of 247 186 LBUVMAX2 Visoski - cross
1 Q. And from 2000 onwards or till 2004 or five, you were flying both the Gulfstream and the Boeing?
2 A. That's correct.
3 Q. Now, in the period from 1991, when you were first hired, to 2005, you flew numerous flights for Epstein?
4 A. Correct.
5 Q. Would it be accurate to say that you flew over 1,000 flights during that time period?
6 A. I'd have to look at my records, but it was probably close to that, yes.
7 Q. Give or take?
8 A. Give or take, yes.
9 Q. That's a lot of flights.
10 A. We consider it more in hours than flights, but --
11 Q. Understood.
12 And Epstein would frequently have other passengers on these flights, right?
13 A. Yes.
14 Q. And many of these passengers were female; correct?
15 A. Correct.
16 Q. And sometimes you saw the passengers, right?
17 A. Yes.
18 Q. There were times when you, I think, stood at the entrance of the plane near the cockpit when the passengers arrived and you might have greeted them?
19 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
20 DOJ-OGR-00011830
